# lyra-registry

> Lyra Registry is a standalone API + MCP service that catalogs, scores, and serves metadata for all tools in the Lyra ecosystem. It enables discovery, evaluation, and integration of 800+ crypto, blockchain, DeFi, memecoin, NFT, metaverse, trading tools, MCP tools. The list will continue to grow.

## Overview

lyra-registry is an open-source project by nirholas. Lyra Registry is a standalone API + MCP service that catalogs, scores, and serves metadata for all tools in the Lyra ecosystem. It enables discovery, evaluation, and integration of 800+ crypto, blockchain, DeFi, memecoin, NFT, metaverse, trading tools, MCP tools. The list will continue to grow.

## Repository

- URL: https://github.com/nirholas/lyra-registry
- Language: TypeScript
- License: MIT
- Author: nirholas

Contributions are welcome. See CONTRIBUTING.md for guidelines.
